sent.orig: The Seller shall reimburse the expense incurred by the Buyer upon receipt of the Buyer's invoice.
sent.trans: 卖方应在收到发票后偿还买方因此而产生的费用。

sent.orig: Seller must immediately pay to Buyer the above mentioned penalty after Buyer's cancellation of this Contract.
sent.trans: 尽管取消了合同，但卖方仍须立即向买方交付上述规定罚款。

sent.orig: The transportation cost of transfer inventory from seller to buyer to buyer can be significant.
sent.trans: 卖家与买家及买家间转移库存的运输费用非常明显。

sent.orig: Upon Buyer requests and at Buyer cost, Seller can provide the CCIC certificate.
sent.trans: 在买方要求及付费下，卖方可提供CCIC证明书作质量检查。

sent.orig: Buyer may at Buyer's expenses its representative be present during the draft at the loading port.
sent.trans: 做装港水尺期间，买方可自费派代表全程监督。
